snippet: The police at the University of Pittsburgh arrested a New York man on charges of making terrorist threats to four professors. The bomb threats, however, continued Thursday morning.
abstract: Police at the University of Pittsburgh arrest a New York man Mark Lee Krangle on charges of making terrorist threats to four professors, but he is not charged with making the more than 60 bomb threats that have caused major disruptions across the campus since mid-February.
lead_paragraph: The police at the University of Pittsburgh arrested a New York man on charges of making terrorist threats to four professors. The bomb threats, however, continued Thursday morning.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Bomb Threats Continue After Arrest
